atlantic.title: The New, Everyday Fiery Train Crash
atlantic.topComment: If terrorists attack again it will be with an IED derailing a passenger train track.

atlantic.title: The Rise of Homeschooling Among Black Families
atlantic.topComment: Protecting their kids from the racism of the school systems will be one of the best gifts parents could give their kids.

atlantic.title: The Miracle of Minneapolis
atlantic.topComment:
The Twin Cities have for decades benefited from a form of limited socialism. But it's the same socialism that drives Costco and Sam's
Club: Collectively we can afford a better quality of life than we can
as individuals. We can buy smartly because we ...
